headline: Amazon Web Services Outage Persists, Hindering Major Sites and Apps
summary: A major  Amazon  Web Services outage threw much of the internet into disarray on Monday as popular websites and social-media platforms struggled to recover.  The world‚Äôs largest cloud provider said in an update at 1:38 p.m. Eastern time that it was seeing ‚Äúearly signs of recovering‚Äù across a few availability zones in the Eastern U.S., adding that it was in the process of ‚Äúapplying mitigations‚Ä¶at which point we expect launch errors and network connectivity issues to subside.‚Äù  AWS said in an earlier update that it had narrowed down the source of the network connectivity issues.

headline: Robinhood Gets More Investment from BlackRock. The Stock Is Rising.
summary: Robinhood Markets has been a lucrative investment for shareholders this year, and the world‚Äôs largest asset manager is growing its stake in the brokerage platform.  BlackRock  increased its position in  Robinhood  by more than 40% in the third quarter, it disclosed in a securities filing over the weekend.  The asset manager now owns about 55.8 million Robinhood shares as of Sept. 30, giving it a 7.2% ownership stake.

content.title: Robinhood Gets More Investment from BlackRock. The Stock Is Rising.
content.summary: Robinhood Markets has been a lucrative investment for shareholders this year, and the world‚Äôs largest asset manager is growing its stake in the brokerage platform.  BlackRock  increased its position in  Robinhood  by more than 40% in the third quarter, it disclosed in a securities filing over the weekend.  The asset manager now owns about 55.8 million Robinhood shares as of Sept. 30, giving it a 7.2% ownership stake.

headline: AWS outage impacts Coinbase, Robinhood: What we know
summary: Amazon's (AMZN) cloud services platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS), is experiencing a widespread outage, affecting major platforms and websites like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), Snapchat (SNAP). Yahoo Finance Technology Editor Dan Howley joins Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss what we know. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: AWS outage impacts Coinbase, Robinhood: What we know
content.description:
Amazon's (AMZN) cloud services platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS), is experiencing a widespread outage, affecting major platforms and websites like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), Snapchat (SNAP).

Yahoo Finance Technology Editor Dan Howley joins Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss what we know.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Amazon Web Services outage sparks global issues, Trump lists China demands
summary: A massive Amazon Web Services (AMZN) outage has sparked issues on websites across the globe. Impacted sites include Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), and Roblox (RBLX). AWS services have started to come back online. President Trump has laid out a list of demands China must meet before the countries resume trade talks. They include buying more US soybeans. For more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise click here.

content.title: Amazon Web Services outage sparks global issues, Trump lists China demands
content.description:
A massive Amazon Web Services (AMZN) outage has sparked issues on websites across the globe. Impacted sites include Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), and Roblox (RBLX). AWS services have started to come back online.

President Trump has laid out a list of demands China must meet before the countries resume trade talks. They include buying more US soybeans.

For more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise click here.
